communication_channels.body: Hi {{recipient.firstName}} {{recipient.preferredName}} {{recipient.lastName | first}}, This is a confirmation of your appointment with us at {{recipient.appointmentTime}}. To view details of your appointment, please log in at {{portalURL}}.

communication_channels.subject: Appointment Confirmation
communication_channels.body:
Hi {{recipient.firstName}} {{recipient.preferredName}} {{recipient.lastName | first}},

This is a confirmation of your appointment with us. To view details of your appointment, please log in at {{portalURL}}.

Date & Time : {{recipient.appointmentDate}} at {{recipient.appointmentTime}}

Regards.

{{recipient.telehealthBox}}
communication_channels.telehealth_body: This is a telehealth Appointment. Please click {{recipient.joiningUrl}} to join the meeting.
